name: Arvan Technologies Pvt. Ltd.
tagline: We develop smart apps that power the web & Mobile
description:
Arvan Technologies Pvt. Ltd. is software development company from Pune, India. The company’s works on Offshore or Outsourced Product Development, Software Solutions and Database Consulting. We have delivered projects in Web, Mobile and Cloud Computing. We have served customers from various countries and in industries like Retail, Food & Beverages, Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP), Business Intelligence, Warehousing, Supply Chain Management.
The company has a highly skilled team of engineering graduates, post graduates and consultants bringing their varied expertise to the table. By engaging closely with our clients, we look forward for a long term association with everyone.
Enterprise applications need stability, scalability, quick reporting, strong architecture and many such features. Our team understands the enterprise needs and the domain of the business. Only then can each one of us build a strong application that makes you and your customer’s productive. We are working on enterprise applications powered by technologies like Java, .Net, J2EE, Ext JS (Sencha).
Rest assured, your business will be in safe hands for years to come.
